attributes.action: Petition to block a second europian Union referendum
attributes.additional_details: The remain side have already had there petition on many main stream media news channels , this could snowball into another referendum I fear , let's not have a second referendum , vote leave won the contest and democracy was served
attributes.background: Due to the continuing demand from remain voters on the europian Union referendum to push for a second vote simply because they lost , I think it is only fair that the leave side should also have a petition to block this move
